attributes.description:
The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. 

This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 2 year / 30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This new spec Suzuki Swift is now packed with ESP(Electronic Stability Program) assisting you in those hectic bends.
Book your test drive today!

Finance Available to all Approved Buyers, Trade in's are Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.

Well specced with Keyless Entry and Keyless Stop Start, Cruise Control with adaptive braking and acceleration, Multi Function Steering with Paddle Shift, Front and Rear PDC with a Reverse Camera, Navigation, Harmon Kardon Sound, Bluetooth Connectivity and much, much more. The driver modes are not just there for show but display significant differences which are a lot of fun. Contact our team for further information. Speak to Gavin De Vries, Tebogo Maledu, Herman Smit or Evert Breedt

attributes.description: BMW 540i PROTECTION - V8 Power And Bulletproof Protection Is An Explosive Combination In This Unique Vehicle. Our 1999 Model Is Presented In Metallic Black With A Grey Leather Interior And Fine Wood Interior Trim. It Has Covered 133 000km. Fitted With Factory Protection BMW OEM BULLETPROOF To B4 LEVEL. Features Include Rear Park Distance Control, Multi Functional Steering Wheel, Telephone, Air Conditioner, Front Electric Windows, Rear Windows Do Not Go Down As Is Customary On Armoured Cars. This Vehicle Is A Rare Find. Contact Us Now. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.
